alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 6:13PM MDT until May 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 613 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Brush, or 6 miles southeast of Fort Morgan, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fort Morgan, Brush, Antelope Springs and Snyder. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
